name: Random Animal
description: Random Animal is a small app where you can get a random picture, gif or video of a cat or dog.

name: Weather App
description: Weather App is an Angular app where you can search for current weather through the OpenWeatherApp API.

name: Budget Planner
description: Budget Planner is an react app inspired by my very first coding project 2016. Enter your income and some expenses and the app sums it up.
